seo_defaultDescription: South Korean indie artist and music producer. Creating original BGM, soundtracks, and instrumental music.

seo_pages_builtWith_description: Technologies and tools used to build Sound Blue website. React, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, and more.
seo_pages_about_description: About Sound Blue and SoundBlueMusic. Learn more about the artist, music, and vision.
seo_pages_chat_description: Chat with Sound Blue assistant. Get help with tools and discover features.
seo_pages_music_description: Listen to Sound Blue's music. Original BGM, soundtracks, ambient, and instrumental tracks.
pageDescriptions_home: Main landing page of Sound Blue
pageDescriptions_about: Learn about the artist and music
pageDescriptions_builtWith: Technologies used to build this site
pageDescriptions_sitemap: Overview of all pages on this site
search_pages_builtWith_desc: Technologies used to build this site
home_tagline: hi, im sound blue, i make music.
home_description: South Korean indie artist and music producer. Creating original BGM, soundtracks, and instrumental music.
privacy_sections_collection_content: Sound Blue collects minimal information necessary to provide our services. Currently, this site does not collect any personal information.
privacy_sections_cookies_content: This site stores theme preferences (light/dark mode) and language settings in local storage to improve user experience.
privacy_sections_thirdParty_content: This site is hosted on Cloudflare Pages. Please refer to Cloudflare's privacy policy for more information.
privacy_sections_contact_content: For privacy-related inquiries, please contact us through our GitHub repository.
terms_sections_use_content: By using the Sound Blue website, you agree to these terms of service.
terms_sections_copyright_content: All content on this site (music, images, text, etc.) is protected by SoundBlueMusic's copyright. Unauthorized reproduction, distribution, or modification is prohibited.
terms_sections_disclaimer_content: This site is provided "as is" without any express or implied warranties.
terms_sections_changes_content: These terms may be changed without prior notice. Updated terms become effective when posted on this site.
license_soundRecording_description: Sound Blue's sound recordings (field recordings) may only be used for creating original works.
license_soundRecording_permitted_items: Use in creative works (videos, music, games, etc.)
Modify, transform, and create derivative works
Use in personal and commercial creative projects
license_soundRecording_prohibited_items: Redistribution of sounds prohibited - Cannot distribute original or modified sound files
Standalone sale or distribution of sound files
Resale as sound libraries or packs
Standalone sharing without incorporation into creative works
license_soundRecording_legal_items: Copyright registration prohibited - You may not register copyright claims on these recordings
Patent applications prohibited - You may not file patents based on these recordings
Violation of these terms immediately terminates your license to use the recordings
license_website_content: All original works on this website — including but not limited to music, compositions, text, design, images, and code — are created by and exclusively owned by SoundBlueMusic. Sound recordings (field recordings) are subject to the separate license above.
soundRecording_intro: Field recordings captured with microphones from various locations, available for use in creative works.
soundRecording_about_content: Sound Blue's Sound Recording project captures high-quality sounds from everyday life and makes them available for use in creative works.
soundRecording_types_items: Urban ambience (streets, cafes, public transit, etc.)
soundRecording_license_content: All sound recordings may **only be used for creating original works**. Redistribution, sale, or standalone distribution is prohibited. **Copyright registration and patent applications on these recordings are strictly prohibited.**
news_description: Latest news and updates from Sound Blue.
blog_description: Music production tips, behind-the-scenes stories, and more.
about_intro: South Korean indie artist and music producer creating original BGM, soundtracks, and instrumental music.
about_sections_artist_content: Sound Blue is a South Korean music artist and producer, active in various creative endeavors under the Sound Blue name. The name represents the calm, deep emotions evoked by the color blue and the nature of sound itself.
about_sections_label_content: SoundBlueMusic is an independent label led by Sound Blue. There's no professional studio yet—the room is the studio.
about_sections_music_content: Specializing in BGM, soundtracks, ambient, and instrumental music. Each piece is crafted to evoke emotions and create immersive atmospheres for games, videos, and other creative projects.
about_sections_vision_content: To create music that resonates with listeners and enhances creative works. Every composition aims to tell a story and transport listeners to new emotional landscapes.
about_sections_projects_items: Original music releases on streaming platforms
Sound Recording: Field recording library for creative works
BGM and soundtrack commissions for games and videos
notFound_message: The page you're looking for doesn't exist or has been moved.
offline_message: Please check your internet connection and try again.
chat_welcome: Hello! I'm the Sound Blue assistant. Feel free to ask me anything about this site, the artist, music, or licensing.
chat_infoPanel_selectPrompt: Ask a question to see related information
chat_topics_about_summary: Learn about Sound Blue, an indie artist and music producer from South Korea.
chat_topics_music_summary: Discover Sound Blue's music style: BGM, soundtracks, ambient, and instrumental.
chat_topics_license_summary: Information about sound recording usage rights and restrictions.
chat_topics_soundRecording_summary: High-quality field recordings for creative works.
chat_topics_contact_summary: YouTube channel, discography, and other external links.
chat_topics_builtWith_summary: Technologies used to build this website: React, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS.
chat_topics_navigation_summary: Find all pages and resources on this site.
chat_topics_help_summary: View all site pages and navigation options.
chat_responses_greeting: Hello! How can I help you today? Feel free to ask about Sound Blue, music, licensing, or anything else on this site.
chat_responses_help:
You can ask me about:
• Sound Blue (artist information)
• Music style and genres
• Sound recording license
• YouTube and external links
• Site navigation
• Current time and date (Seoul)

Just type your question!
chat_responses_unknown: I'm not sure I understand. Could you try asking about 'Sound Blue', 'music', 'license', or type 'help' for more options?
chat_responses_time: The current time in Seoul is {time}.
chat_responses_topics_about: Sound Blue is a South Korean indie artist and music producer. Creating original BGM, soundtracks, and instrumental music. You can learn more on the About page.
chat_responses_topics_music: Sound Blue specializes in BGM, soundtracks, ambient, and instrumental music. Each piece is crafted to evoke emotions and create immersive atmospheres.
chat_responses_topics_license: Sound Blue's sound recordings may only be used for creating original works. Redistribution and standalone distribution are prohibited. Please check the License page for details.
chat_responses_topics_soundRecording: The Sound Recording project provides high-quality field recordings for creative works. Nature sounds, urban ambience, and sound effects are available.
chat_responses_topics_contact:
You can find Sound Blue on:
• YouTube: youtube.com/@SoundBlueMusic
• Discography: soundblue.music
• GitHub: github.com/soundbluemusic
chat_responses_topics_builtWith: This website is built with React, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS. It's deployed on Cloudflare Pages as a static site.
chat_responses_topics_navigation: You can find all pages in the Sitemap. Main sections include: Home, About, News, Blog, Sound Recording, and Built With.
music_description: Original music, BGM, soundtracks, and instrumental tracks.
music_emptyStateHint: All releases are available on YouTube.
